view

Interface View

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MazeWindow, MyView

    public interface View

    View interface

    This interface represents a general view It has the functionality that a view must have.*
    Since:
    2014-09-14
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leibovitz Edan
